name: Leprechaun in the Hood
description:
Leprechaun in the hood is an indie quest (or random encounter? or adventure?) game inspired by the classic cult horror movie for which it was named. Sneak through the Parrot Club without getting caught. Can you get the loot and get out with your life?  

Remember, the Lep in the hood is always up to no good.

Features
  • Play as characters from the original Leprechaun in the Hood.
  • Explore all of the secrets the game has to offer.
  • Choose your own fate– be the hero of your own story!
  • Enjoy a  reactive story with excellent replay value
  • Experience a story made by loving fans of the movie!
Purchase

Recommended Donation is $10 (game is free-to-play)

Community "Death to he who sets a Leprechaun free. Steal his gold, it will corrupt your soul, you see. For many a moon the legend has grown, death toll increases, solution unknown. Beware the evil wanderer in search of his loot, lest you suffer the wrath of his golden flute. Flee while you can, the future's not good- for no one is safe from a Lep in the Hood…"
